title: ICYMI: The Saga of Nina Simone’s Twitter Account (ft. Kamala Harris)
description:
What do Chloe Bailey, Nina Simone, and Vice President Kamala Harris have to do with one another? We’re here to help you figure that out. On today’s episode, Rachelle and Madison talk about how a cover of Simone’s “Feeling Good” turned into a story that ultimately felt anything but. But first, they examine Rachel Lindsay’s recent comments about the Bachelor franchise. 
Podcast production by Daniel Schroeder, Derek John, and Jasmine Ellis.
﻿Support ICYMI and listen to the show with zero ads. Sign up to become a Slate Plus member for just $1 for your first month.
